TopicTitle: Rover wheels inoperative due to parts placed behind

Articles.Content:
The wheel suspension leaves some space between the wheel and the vehicle's body to place some parts, like rover's batteries. Theis was very usefull in 1.05 but since 1.1 it makes wheels blocked and "engine inoperative". Woth to mention I carefully placed these batteries not to touch the wheel even when turned. It's safe amount of space to let the suspension work too. The change made my already deployed rover useless. Any space is valuable and I miss the one between the wheels and the rover's body.

Above is my rover with bateries placed on its sides. It's not the best angle of view but the batteries and wheels are well separated. No wheel can roll nor turn, however.

Agreed. This is what I experience during daytime also. 

You can work around it once you get a sense of the proportions.
